item.title: PDD
item.description: score:2 Chances: PDD Holdings Jumps 15% On Earnings Beat; Revenue Up 66% PDD ADRs Surge as Online Shoppers Send Sales Soaring at Parent of Pinduoduo and Temu Pinduoduo-owner PDD beats revenue expectations as promotions lure consumers Temu-Owner PDD Soars After Strong Sales Defy Chinese Gloom China-Founded Rivals Shein and Temu Ramp Up War for American Shoppers Risks: PDD Holdings Inc.
